SEARCH
Module org.example.game
Package engine.ui

Class UIManager

java.lang.Object
engine.ui.UIManager
public class UIManager extends Object
Manages rendering and user interaction for the game UI, including inventory display, dialogue boxes, pause menu, crafting menu, and win screen.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a UIManager with the necessary game state and save manager.

  • Constructor Details

    • UIManager

      public UIManager(Inventory inventory, List<Recipe> recipes, List<NPC> npcs, SaveLoadManager saveMgr)
      Constructs a UIManager with the necessary game state and save manager.
      Parameters:
      inventory - the player's inventory to display
      recipes - the list of crafting recipes
      npcs - the list of NPCs for dialogue handling
      saveMgr - the save/load manager for persistence operations

  • Method Details

    • renderUI

      public void renderUI(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Renders the appropriate UI overlay after the world is drawn.

      Displays win screen if game is won, pause menu if paused, inventory, active dialogue, and crafting menu when open.

      Parameters:
      gc - the GraphicsContext used for drawing UI elements

    • togglePause

      public void togglePause()
      Toggles the paused state of the game UI.

    • toggleCrafting

      public void toggleCrafting()
      Toggles the crafting menu visibility.

    • isPaused

      public boolean isPaused()
      Checks if the game is currently paused.
      Returns:
      true if paused, false otherwise

    • isCraftingOpen

      public boolean isCraftingOpen()
      Checks if the crafting menu is currently open.
      Returns:
      true if crafting menu is open, false otherwise

    • getInventory

      public Inventory getInventory()
      Provides access to the underlying inventory.
      Returns:
      the Inventory instance

    • handlePauseInput

      public void handlePauseInput(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent e)
      Handles keyboard input when the pause menu is active.

      Navigates menu options and executes selected action on ENTER.

      Parameters:
      e - the KeyEvent representing the key press

    • handleCraftingInput

      public void handleCraftingInput(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent e)
      Handles keyboard input when the crafting menu is active.

      Navigates recipe list and crafts item on ENTER.

      Parameters:
      e - the KeyEvent representing the key press
